subject: Baseball
Cartoons and Cartoonists
Blogs and Blogging (Internet)
lead_paragraph: Joe Petruccio, a 52-year-old creative art director at a Manhattan advertising agency, is a dyed-in-the-wool Mets fan who wears his heart on his blog My Mets Journal.
snippet: Joe Petruccio, a 52-year-old creative art director at a Manhattan advertising agency, is a dyed-in-the-wool Mets fan who wears his heart on his blog My Mets Journal.
